input.content: Chloe, Kate, Drew, and Mikey are gathered in a circle. Drew is opposite Chloe and Kate sees Chloe to her left. At the center is a bottle which points towards Mikey. When Chloe spins the bottle, it rotates two and three-quarters of a full circle. Who is the person opposite the direction the bottle is pointing?
Do not provide any information apart from the answer. Do not include punctuations in the answer.
